update.Text: select a.SysRowID,a.Company,a.CustID,a.CustNum,a.Name,Balance, CreditLimit2, UnPaidInvoices , OutStandingOrders, UnPostedInvoices , AgeCurr, Age30, Age60, Age90 , Age120, Age150, TermsExceed from [vwCustomer]

command.text: select SysRowID,Company,CustID,CustNum,Name,Balance, CreditLimit, UnPaidInvoices , OutStandingOrders, UnPostedInvoices , AgeCurr, Age30, Age60, Age90 , Age120, Age150, TermsExceed from [vwCustomer]

insert.Script: select SysRowID,Company,CustID,CustNum,Name,Balance, CreditLimit, UnPaidInvoices , OutStandingOrders, UnPostedInvoices , AgeCurr, Age30, Age60, Age90 , Age120, Age150, TermsExceed from [vwCustomer] Where SysRowID=@Context_CustSysRowID

update.Script: select SysRowID,Company,CustID,CustNum,Name,Balance, CreditLimit, UnPaidInvoices , OutStandingOrders, UnPostedInvoices , AgeCurr, Age30, Age60, Age90 , Age120, Age150, TermsExceed from [vwCustomer]

select top 1 SysRowID,Company,CustID,CustNum,Name,Balance, CreditLimit, UnPaidInvoices , OutStandingOrders, UnPostedInvoices , AgeCurr, Age30, Age60, Age90 , Age120, Age150, TermsExceed from [vwCustomer]

update.Copy: CustNum=CustNum, CustID=CustID, CustomerName=Name, CAddress1=Address1, CAddress2=Address2, CAddress3=Address3, CCity=City, CState=State, CZip=Zip, CCountry=Country
ShipToName=Name, SAddress2=Address2, SAddress2=Address2, SAddress3=Address3, SCity=City, SState=State, SZip=Zip, SCountry=Country

CustNum=CustNum, CustID=CustID, CustomerName=Name, CAddress1=Address1, CAddress2=Address2, CAddress3=Address3, CCity=City, CState=State, CZip=Zip, CCountry=Country, Balance=Balance, CreditLimit=CreditLimit2, UnPaidInvoices=UnPaidInvoices, OutStandingOrders=OutStandingOrders, UnPostedInvoices=UnPostedInvoices, AgeCurr=AgeCurr, Age30=Age30, Age60=Age60, Age90=Age90, SZip=Zip, Age120=Age120, Age150=Age150, TermsExceed=TermsExceed

insert.Script: SELECT @OHCompany = CompanyName FROM OrderHed INNER JOIN Company ON OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

update.Script: SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

insert.Script: IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum END

update.Script:
IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN
SET @BasePrice=0 SET @SellingPrice=0
SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum END

SET @OrderQty=1 SET @Focqty=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

SET @OrderQty=1 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

insert.Script: IF @OrderQty <= 0 Begin PreventDefault() End ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,'','','') END

update.Script:
SET @OrderQty=1 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin PreventDefault() End ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,'','','') END

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,'','','') END

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName) END

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName) END

insert.Script: SET @OrderHedID = @Context_OrderHedID

update.Formula: SELECT SUM(OrderDtl.SellingPrice* OrderDtl.OrderQty) FROM OrderDtl WHERE OrderDtl.OrderHedID= OrderHed.OrderHedID
SELECT SUM(OrderDtl.SellingPrice* OrderDtl.OrderQty) FROM OrderDtl WHERE OrderDtl.OrderHedID= OrderHed.OrderHedID
update.Label: Amount

update.Script:
IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN
SET @BasePrice=0 SET @SellingPrice=0
SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum END
IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'OrderQty' OR @Arguments_Trigger = 'SellingPrice' BEGIN
SET @Amount=@SellingPrice * OrderQty END

IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN
SET @BasePrice=0 SET @SellingPrice=0
SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum END

IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN
SET @BasePrice=0 SET @SellingPrice=0
SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum
SET @Amount=@SellingPrice * @OrderQty
END

IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN
SET @BasePrice=0 SET @SellingPrice=0
SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum
SET @Amount=@SellingPrice * @OrderQty
END
ELSE IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'OrderQty' BEGIN SET @Amount=@SellingPrice * @OrderQty END

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN
IF EXISTS (SELECT Top 1 BulkOrder from OrderHed where OrderHedID = @OrderHedID AND BulkOrder=1) BEGIN INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName) END
END

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName)
END

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName)
END

SET @Exception = @TermsExceed

IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 BEGIN SET @Exception = 1 END
IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET @Exception = 1 WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

update.Script:
IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 BEGIN SET @Exception = 1 END
IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET @Exception = 1 WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

update.Script: if ([OrderRelQty] > 0) this.result.focus('Quantity', 'The quantity must be greater than zero.');
if ([OrderRelQty] <= 0) this.result.focus('Quantity', 'The quantity must be greater than zero.');
this.result.focus('Quantity', 'The quantity must be greater than zero.');

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0 and @OrderHedBulkOrder = 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName)
END

IF (@OrderHedBulkOrder = 0) Begin IF (@OrderQty is not null and @OrderQty <= 0) Begin set @Result_Focus = 'Quantity, The quantity must be greater than zero.' set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 End ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO OrderRel (OrderHedID,OrderDtlID,OrderRelQty,FOCRelQty,ShipByDate,ShipToSysRowID,ShipToName) VALUES (@OrderHedID,@OrderDtlID,@OrderQty,@Focqty,@OHShipByDate,@OHShipToSysRowID,@OHShipToName)
END End

SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHCustID=a.CustID, @OrderHedBulkOrder = a.BulkOrder FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

update.Script: SET @Creator = @BusinessRules_UserName SET @CreatedOn = GETDATE()
SET @ModifiedBy = @BusinessRules_UserName SET @ModifiedOn = GETDATE()

IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 and @ProposedBasePrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeBasePrice from ' + Cast(@BasePrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedBasePrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END
IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 and @ProposedSellingPrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeSellingPrice from ' + Cast(@SellingPrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedSellingPrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 and @ProposedBasePrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeBasePrice from ' + Cast(@BasePrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedBasePrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END
IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 and @ProposedSellingPrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeSellingPrice from ' + Cast(@SellingPrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedSellingPrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 and @ProposedBasePrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeBasePrice from ' + Cast(@BasePrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedBasePrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END
IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 and @ProposedSellingPrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeSellingPrice from ' + Cast(@SellingPrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedSellingPrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

insert.Script:
IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 and @ProposedBasePrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeBasePrice from ' + Cast(@BasePrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedBasePrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END
IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 and @ProposedSellingPrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = ExceptionDtl + ', ChangeSellingPrice from ' + Cast(@SellingPrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedSellingPrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

insert.Name: Exception
insert.Script:
IF @ChangeBasePrice = 1 and @ProposedBasePrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = isnull(ExceptionDtl,'') + ', ChangeBasePrice from ' + Cast(@BasePrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedBasePrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END
IF @ChangeSellingPrice = 1 and @ProposedSellingPrice > 0 BEGIN UPDATE OrderHed SET Exception = 1 ,ExceptionDtl = isnull(ExceptionDtl,'') + ', ChangeSellingPrice from ' + Cast(@SellingPrice as nvarchar) + ' To ' + Cast(@ProposedSellingPrice as nvarchar) WHERE OrderHedID = @OrderHedID END

update.Script: Update TotalAmount = SUM(SellingPrice * OrderQty) OrderDtl Where OrderHedID = @OrderHedID
Update OrderHed set TotalAmount = SUM(OrderDtl.SellingPrice * OrderDtl.OrderQty) From OrderDtl Where OrderHed.OrderHedID = @OrderHedID and OrderHed.OrderHedID=OrderDtl.OrderHedID
Update OrderHed set TotalAmount = Select ( isnull(SUM(OrderDtl.SellingPrice * OrderDtl.OrderQty),99) From OrderDtl Where OrderDtl.OrderHedID = @OrderHedID) Where OrderHed.OrderHedID = @OrderHedID
Update OrderHed set TotalAmount = Select ( isnull(SUM(OrderDtl.SellingPrice * OrderDtl.OrderQty),99) From OrderDtl Where OrderDtl.OrderHedID = @OrderHedID) Where OrderHed.OrderHedID = @OrderHedID

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID

update.FilterExpression: Case When @ExOrderType = 'N' Then Ium in ('ctn') Else Ium in ('p') end
@ExOrderType is null Or Ium in (Select IUM from OrderTypePart Where OrderType=@ExOrderType)
@ContextFields_ExOrderType is null Or Ium in (Select IUM from OrderTypePart Where OrderType=@ContextFields_ExOrderType)
Ium in (Select IUM from OrderTypePart Where OrderType=@ContextFields_ExOrderType)
Ium in (Select IUM from OrderTypePart Where OrderType='N')
Ium in (Select IUM from OrderTypePart Where OrderType='N')
Ium not in (Select IUM from OrderTypePart Where OrderType='N')
Ium in (Select Ium from OrderTypePart Where OrderType='N')

update.Script:
SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END ELSE BEGIN SET @OTPP='P' END

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END ELSE BEGIN SET @OTPP='P' END

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END ELSE BEGIN SET @OTPP='P' END
IF @BusinessRules_UserIsInRole('SalesClerk') BEGIN SET @OTEACH='EACH' END

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END ELSE BEGIN SET @OTPP='P' END
IF @BusinessRules_UserRole='SalesClerk' BEGIN SET @OTEACH='EACH' END

SET @OrderQty=0 SET @Focqty=0
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END ELSE BEGIN SET @OTPP='P' END

IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PartSysRowID' BEGIN

SELECT @BasePrice=BasePrice , @SellingPrice=Price, @SellingPricePerBottle=SellingPricePerBottle, @BasePricePerBottle=BasePricePerBottle FROM vwPriceList WHERE Company=@OHCompany and CustNum=@OHCustNum and PartNum=@PartNum
SET @Amount=@SellingPrice * @OrderQty
END
ELSE IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'OrderQty' BEGIN SET @Amount=@SellingPrice * @OrderQty END

--IF @OrderHedBulkOrder = 1 --BEGIN --SET @OrderRelQty=1 --SET @FocrelQty=1 --END

update.Body:
^SignInInstruction^Sign in to access the protected site content.^SignInInstruction^
^SignInHeader^Instructions^SignInHeader^
^SignInPara1^Two standard user accounts are automatically created when application is initialized if membership option has been selected for this application.^SignInPara1^
^SignInPara3^Move the mouse pointer over the link Login to this web site on the right-hand side at the top of the page and sign in with one of the accounts listed below.^SignInPara3^
^AdminDesc^Administrative account^AdminDesc^:
admin / admin123%

^UserDesc^Standard user account^UserDesc^:
user / user123%

^SignInInstruction^Sign in to access the protected site content.^SignInInstruction^

^SignInPara1^Two standard user accounts are automatically created when application is initialized if membership option has been selected for this application.^SignInPara1^

^SignInPara2^The administrative account admin is authorized to access all areas of the web site and membership manager. The standard user account is allowed to access all areas of the web site with the exception of membership manager.^SignInPara2^

^AdminDesc^Administrative account^AdminDesc^:
admin / admin123%

^UserDesc^Standard user account^UserDesc^:
user / user123%
